description: Checkout errors around 03:15 UTC – multiple timeouts talking to the database.
Traffic errors around 03:30 UTC; pods for checkout-web keep restarting.

Writes failing around 07:15 UTC – storage errors and increased latency.
Spikes of 5xx around 03:30 UTC – checkout-web pods restarting.
Intermittent payment failures – some requests getting 429s from gateway.
Site feels slow – cache hit rate dropped around 06:05 UTC.
Search results loading slowly around 05:40 UTC.

Around 09:40 UTC, upstream TLS handshakes began to fail intermittently for payment-related traffic.
Around 09:55 UTC, checkout flows began timing out; several services mention database connection exhaustion.
Around 10:10 UTC, background jobs started lagging; queue depths climbed and workers fell behind schedule.
Around 10:25 UTC, one of the core services started failing writes; logs hint at disk space or inode exhaustion.
